resources.string: - Expansion in business due to increased footfalls and value added services.
- Increase in Revenue on the same fleet resulting in additional profits.
- Job creations in Rural and Urban localities.
Income from Core Business Correspondent (BC) Activities
Franchisees to be appointed as Bank\'s Business Correspondents and earn percentage based fees on money transfer, cash deposit, cash withdrawal, bill payments and other services to customer.
Income from services provided for Bus Corporation\'s SmartCard
Franchisee will be authorised to Issue, Load and Surrender the Bus Corporation SmartCard and earn a flat fee on every activity.
Network connection is required for this to continue!
